name: 11th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Music, Sound, Art and Design 2022
content: The 11th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Music, Sound, Art and Design (EvoMUSART) 2022 is a multidisciplinary conference that brings together researchers who are working on the application of Artificial Intelligence techniques in creative and artist fields. EvoMUSART provides the opportunity to present, discuss and promote innovative contributions and ongoing work employing artificial intelligence techniques in fields such as: visual art and music generation, analysis, and interpretation; sound synthesis; architecture; video; poetry; design; and other creative tasks. Therefore, the use of Artificial Intelligence in such creative domains became a significant and exciting area of research. EvoMUSART has become an evo\* conference with independent proceedings since 2012\. The EvoMUSART proceedings are published in Springer Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS). Also, all papers accepted in EvoMUSART 2022 will be encouraged to submit to a new special issue of Entropy (IF 2.524; JCR Q2; ISSN 1099-4300).
